actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 312 (1) of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to exempt a person from the requirement of understanding the English language, if such person is 50 years of age, has been living in the United States for periods totaling at least five years, and was admitted or granted asylum in the United States because of persecution or fear of persecution on account of race, religion, or political opinion.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 312 (1) of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
